body_html:
This is expected.
You're again looking at nvidia-smi usage. This is not reflective of actual memory usage. The Caching memory allocator built into THC holds the memory blocks for future use.

body:
This is expected.
You're again looking at `nvidia-smi` usage. This is not reflective of actual memory usage. The Caching memory allocator built into THC holds the memory blocks for future use.
